articles.title: Edinson Cavani has so much still to offer Man United and Ralf Rangnick - Daily Mail
articles.description: Cavani has endured a season of frustration so far and the 34-year-old has been linked with a January move to Barcelona. But United and Ralf Rangnick are desperate to keep him and with good reason.
articles.content:
Edinson Cavani revealed last year that his archer goal celebration is both a reference to his daughter India and the indigenous Charrúas people of his native Uruguay.
It might as well be Cupid's bow… [+6003 chars]
